doc_names: Order Approving and Entering Consent Decree

event.doc_name: Order Approving and Entering Consent Decree

evidence.text: it is hereby ORDERED, ADJUDGED, AND DECREED that the joint motion is GRANTED, the Agreement is APPROVED and the Agreement's terms are hereby incorporated into this Order as if fully set forth herein.
evidence.source_document: Order Approving and Entering Consent Decree

add_extracted.value: The court ordered that the joint motion for entry of the consent decree is GRANTED and the Agreement is APPROVED, incorporating the Agreement’s terms into the order and retaining jurisdiction to enforce the Agreement until the defendants fulfill their obligations.

evidence.text: ORDERED that James Conrad Welch is appointed the Monitor, pursuant to Paragraphs 129-30 of the Agreement.  ECF 2-1.

add_extracted.value: The court appointed James Conrad Welch as the Monitor pursuant to Paragraphs 129-30 of the Agreement, ordering that he serve as monitor under ECF 2-1.

evidence.text: ORDER: The joint motion ECF 2 is GRANTED. The Agreement is APPROVED and the Agreement's terms are hereby incorporated into this Order as if fully set forth herein. The Court retains complete jurisdiction of this matter to enforce this Order and the terms of the incorporated Agreement until the Defendants have fulfilled their obligations therein. Signed by District Judge Rebecca Beach Smith on 8/31/20.

add_extracted.value: ORDER: The joint motion ECF 2 is GRANTED. The Agreement is APPROVED and the Agreement's terms are hereby incorporated into this Order as if fully set forth herein. The Court retains complete jurisdiction of this matter to enforce this Order and the terms of the incorporated Agreement until the Defendants have fulfilled their obligations therein. Signed by District Judge Rebecca Beach Smith on 8/31/20.

evidence.text: ORDER APPOINTING MONITOR. James Conrad Welch is appointed the Monitor, pursuant to Paragraphs 129-30 of the Agreement. ECF 2-1. Signed by District Judge Rebecca Beach Smith on 9/10/2020.

add_extracted.value: ORDER APPOINTING MONITOR. James Conrad Welch is appointed the Monitor, pursuant to Paragraphs 129-30 of the Agreement. ECF 2-1. Signed by District Judge Rebecca Beach Smith on 9/10/2020.

evidence.text: ORDER: Plaintiff's Motion to Seal, ECF 39 is DENIED. Defendant requested that the document be filed as "Exhibit A" to the Fifth Monitor's Report, ECF 39 at 1, However, the Monitor's report makes no reference to the existence of an "Exhibit A." Therefore, the Clerk is DIRECTED to file the document as an unsealed supplement to the Fifth Monitor's Report rather than as an attachment or exhibit thereto. Signed by District Judge Rebecca Beach Smith on 6/16/2023.

add_extracted.value: ORDER: Plaintiff's Motion to Seal, ECF 39 is DENIED. evidence.text: ORDER re 50 Motion to Terminate 53 Defendant's Motion to Withdraw and 55 MOTION to Terminate Sections 32-38 of the Agreement. The Court ORDERS that the Joint Motion 55 is GRANTED. Sections 31-38 of the parties' Agreement is hereby TERMINATED. All other sections remain in effect. Defendant's Motion to Withdraw, 53 is GRANTED; and the Defendant's Original Motion to terminate 50 is accordingly WITHDRAWN. Signed by District Judge Rebecca Beach Smith on 7/26/2023.

add_extracted.value: ORDER re 50 Motion to Terminate 53 Defendant's Motion to Withdraw and 55 MOTION to Terminate Sections 32-38 of the Agreement. add_extracted.value: Denied the Plaintiff's Motion to Seal, ECF 39; directed the Clerk to file the document as an unsealed supplement to the Fifth Monitor's Report.

evidence.text: ORDER- Upon consideration of the Joint Motion to Dismiss 75, it is hereby ORDERED that this action is dismissed with prejudice. Signed by District Judge Rebecca Beach Smith on 7/31/2024.

add_extracted.value: Ordered dismissal with prejudice of the action upon consideration of Joint Motion to Dismiss 75.
